description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'TvListingScreen' that displays a grid of book items for a specific category. It includes UI layout, navigation, and references to other custom widgets and routing.

classes.name: TvListingScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a grid of books for a given category, with navigation to detail pages.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the TvListingScreen, including a header and a grid of focusable book cards.
